description: This file defines the markup, styles, and client-side scripts for a web-based database visualizer interface. It provides UI components for selecting databases, tables, and viewing table data with interactive and dynamic features.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases and updates the sidebar with database entries.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resets selections, updates UI.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database's table list and loads tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a selected database and populates the table list.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads data for a specific table and renders it in the display area.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders a data table given the data rows.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual table cell content, handling objects, long strings, and null values.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for full visibility.
